mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BNO, TITLE, content, WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, UPDATEDDATE FROM BOARD ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, UPDATEDDATE FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATEDDATE = SYSDATE WHERE BNO = #{bno}
